title: Bus Booking Application
description: A full-stack bus booking app built using the MERN stack. Users can search, book, and manage bus tickets. It integrates RESTful APIs for route management and booking functionalities, with a responsive and user-friendly interface.

title: WebRTC Video Calling App
description: A real-time video calling app using WebRTC, Express, and Socket.io. It allows seamless peer-to-peer communication with support for video and audio calls, using UDP for low latency and efficient connection handling.

title: Vanilla Women's Shopping Website
description: A women's shopping website made with HTML and CSS. Users can browse categories and view products with a responsive design that ensures a seamless experience across devices.

title: Weather App
description: A weather app built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that provides real-time weather updates using an API. It displays key weather information like temperature and humidity for any location.
